website_summaries.verdict: Made from sleek stainless steel, this ultra-strong magnet supports half a dozen knives, saving counter and drawer space.
pros: Can be affixed to a fridge or mounted to a wall, backsplash, or cabinet using the included hardware or removable adhesives
The magnet is so strong RV owners report it holds knives in place even while driving
cons: Be careful during installation –some owners report the forceful magnet pinched their fingers while removing the backing
Rusting may occur if knives are placed on the bar while damp

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet and very nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a 5 star review except for one thing--there were no instructions with it. I kept wondering why I couldn't get it to stick to my refrigerator because the magnet is really strong. Turns out you need to remove the back cover. With the front of the holder laying on a soft towel, pull the two plastic tabs up to remove the back, don't replace the back cover, and just keep it someplace safe in case you want to put the holder on a wall later. I agree with other reviewers that large knives have to be attached with the handle up.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Pincher

customer_reviews.title: Double sided magnetic knife holder will work on your SS fridge.
customer_reviews.text: My old magnetic knife rack had become dangerous (knives would fall off if you came near it). Was looking for something that would work on my fridge - this was perfect. Super magnetic on both sides I have 7 knives on it and it looks fantastic. Not sure why some people said it would not work on fridge. I have a stainless steel fridge and it works on the side. You have to remove the plastic from the back to activate the magnetic strip on the back. Be careful I pinched my finger so hard it bled (cause it is super magnetic and I did not have a tight enough hold on it).
customer_reviews.author: Picasso

customer_reviews.title: LOW QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: How low quality can it get? - Edges are not filed down; you can cut yourself - Magnets inside are only strong in the center; I wouldn't recommend anyone to keep knives on the sides Overall, it's just simply too expensive for its quality and the purpose it serves.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Nice Knife magnet bar!
customer_reviews.text: This knife magnet has been very useful in giving me more space in my drawers. At the moment I have the bar stuck to my fridge (I would not recommend this for households with young children due to the possibility of kids knocking them off the fridge and cutting themselves). In order for the magnet bar to stick to the fridge I had to leave the mounting plate off due to the magnet not being strong enough to stay on the fridge through the steel plate.
customer_reviews.author: James Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of knives, including 3, 8" chefs knives that I put on the rack. I don't hang them tip up since I've read reviews about over time the knives slip. Hanging them tip down prevents that entirely as the handle would stop any slip. Magnet holds very solid and let me get rid of that bulky knife block. I hung mine on the side of a cabinet, so there is no movement in it. Easy to install, took, maybe 10 minutes to screw into the side cabinet wall. Looks great, works exactly how I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in MO

customer_reviews.title: does the job you would buy it to do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a mobile food trailer. I'm not quite sure the scale of the utensils that are on the product page but i'm thinking its not going to hold "all that". Still gets five stars cause its a magnet, that is supposed to hold stuff and it does... well. Even in a mobile trailer on bumpy roads, nothings gonna just "fall off". Some of the reviews I read about installation you will need to read, as the base plate will pinch the crap out of you, it is a strong magnet and instructions aren't the clearest. Also, I mounted to metal and for that you will need some self tappers, which are not included, just regular screws.
customer_reviews.author: Stefany L. Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet!
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is very strong (I can see why people were warning to keep your fingers clear of it just in case you pinch yourself) but no installation hardware was included with mine. It's not the end of the world, but it does mean I need to make a trip to the hardware store which is what I was trying to avoid during the pandemic. UPDATE: I found the hardware, it was tucked into the very end of the plastic bag and I almost threw it out with the packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Kae Winters

customer_reviews.title: Knives rarely stay straight up and down with this holder.
customer_reviews.text: For some odd reason the magnet in this knife holder tilts most of my knives slightly sideways. When I first received it and used it for a day or so I posed this question to other purchasers of the knife holder, asking if anyone had the "tilting knife problem" like I did. Nobody who replied had the problem. Other than this I like the knife holder. It is attached to the side of my refrigerator next to the countertop where I do most of my cutting up. So it is handy. If my knives didn't tilt I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I recently sold my house & couldn’t remember how we affixed our previous bars to the cabinets (different model). I’ve moved into a small apartment & one of these was an absolute must. I went with this one because people mentioned installing it with Command Strips. Mine has been on the wall for several weeks with the Command strips. The magnet is super strong. All my knives plus my scissors fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Miller

customer_reviews.title: One of the best kitchen purchases I've made
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I expected. It comes with a wall attachment in the back that comes off to reveal the magnetic strip. Use it on my fridge so I don't need the attachment at the moment, but I'm happy to have the option. Keeping my knives in the strip help me save counter and drawer space, while protecting my knives and my fingers! All in all one of the best kitchen purchases Ive made.
customer_reviews.author: whitbit

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the year!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this strip to put on the refrigerator. After two failed attempts with commercial mounting Velcro tape, we realized that the back panel comes off. This left a double sided magnetic bar for those who want to use it on metal, without screws. No tape needed. We've had it up for two weeks so far, holding a 7 piece Wustof set with heft, plus shears. No more cumbersome wooden block, and did not have to give up limited drawer space! This is probably the best purchase I've made all year!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: The actual bar doesn't actually mount to the wall, ...
customer_reviews.text: The actual bar doesn't actually mount to the wall, it sticks to a metal plate which is mounted. Which causes the bar to wobble when we add or remove knifes. Not a big deal, but it feels cheap
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I really regret not getting this sooner. Why I bothered all these years with other holders, I'll never know. This is by far the most hassle-free way of storing your knives (dry and rust-free). It was a little smaller than I anticipated but I like that it's sleek and doesn't crowd the small space of wall. You can fit 4 large kitchen knives. I'll gladly buy another one when my knife collection expands.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, holds a lot of knives
customer_reviews.text: So happy to finally have proper knife storage! I have a very small kitchen so space is at a premium. A knife block would use up countertop I desperately need. So for years, I just stuffed my knives in a drawer and dealt with dull knives. Then I discovered Command strips and realized I could probably mount a magnetic knife strip on the tile backsplash. I used three medium Command strips to adhere this to the wall. If it falls down it won't be the knife holders fault. I'm happy with how the holder works. I have all the tools I use regularly handy, finally!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Pdx

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small kitchen in a condo. The only reason I gave it a overall 3 stars is because it can only be installed one way. Which may be my stupidity but I only had one space for my knife to go as the above picture shows. So my knives don’t exactly fall off but they point down on top of each other. Other then that, easy installation , for small spaces, and the magnet itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Traci B

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. I don't really have any wall space but the side of my fridge is where I keep my cutting boards. It is able to magnetize to my fridge perfectly... In a perfect spot. You have to take off the back metal mounting bar in order for it to stick, but I don't mind that. They make it easy! Totally worth the money. And maybe I won't lose my can opener anymore.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mohr

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My last magnetic knife holder had hot spots (so to speak) only certain places where you could put the knife - this onedoes not, you can place your knife anywhere and in any direction, it stays where you put it, as long as you're not defying Gravity. Mounts easily, screws are hidden, just perfect well-designed product.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this rack!
customer_reviews.text: Have been wanting to ditch the old knife block and buy back some counter space for awhile and this magnetic strip did the trick! It's attractive, sturdy and just the right size - holds a full set of knives, and then some. The magnet is very strong - no issues with anything falling. Of course it does bring out a little OCD tendency keeping everything straight and equally spaced, but that's part of the fun... ;) Great purchase - do not hesitate if you're looking for this type of knife rack.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the Ouddy 16in Magnetic Knife Holder
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the Ouddy 16in Magnetic Knife Holder, stainless steel. It is easy to install. I have a tile backsplash that I didn't want to drill holes in so I used command strips to install it. Also, the design is such that it could be placed right onto a refrigerator. In the photo you can see that it is holding 5 very large knives and a steel. The magnet can't really handle the steel though and the bottom is resting on the counter. The clean design and easy install definitely make it worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: heatherh

customer_reviews.title: Installed under my cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I installed this under my cabinet and took the sharpener off and installed it under the cabinet also. Looks good and is super function in my main house and in my vacation rental. Far better than risking a bunch of sharp knifes in a drawer or recoating knives with germs every time they go back into a wooden block.
customer_reviews.author: BDA123

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Bliss
customer_reviews.text: Great magnetic strength. I was looking for a refrigerator mounting strip and this one works well. After removing the stainless steel backing that mounts to a wall I attached this strip to the fridge and it has enough magnetic power to stay put while also holding four knives and a pair of scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Not just for knives in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I love this magnetic strip. My husband attached the strip to a side table in my sewing room. You know you cannot have only one pair of scissors. I now have all my scissors in one place and within an easy reach as I need them. The magnet is very strong and will hold my scissors while inserted in the leather protective sleeves. I even put the small screwdriver for my embroidery/sewing machines I use often to change the pressure feet and needles. I would be lost without this magnetic strip.
customer_reviews.author: Penny B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this knife holder to put on the textured black side of my stainless steel fridge. VERY strong magnet on both sides (I read other reviews but still managed to cut my hand removing the plastic "film" between the backplate and the front of the holder. Perhaps wear leather gloves? Looks great and makes getting to my 'good' knives very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McClaren

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but don't expect to move it.
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and the magnet is strong. Due to the magnet strength once you have the mounting bracket set and attach the magnet on it there is no groove or anything to get purchase to separate the two. I used double sided mounting tape to affix to my tile back splash so I didn't have to drill through them.
customer_reviews.author: Stoggycakes

customer_reviews.title: I thought being magnetic that it would stick easily to the frig
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go on the side of my refrigerator to hold my knives. It holds the knives but wouldn't stick to the side of the refrigerator. I thought being magnetic that it would stick easily to the frig. My husband was able to use a couple of small screws to attach it. If you're willing to screw the holder to something, it is a good product. I also bought two of them to give extra support for the knives. I was glad because one bar doesn't hold them securely in place.
customer_reviews.author: I

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is so magnetic I can't even get it off my frig! No worry about it falling and knives going with it. All are held very well. I highly recommend this. Great for tools in the garage also.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kearns

customer_reviews.title: It is not strong enough to stay on fridge once the knives are on...I WANTED TO LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: When this came in the mail, I was so excited. I usually don't write reviews because 90% of the time I am satisfied with the products. The magnet adhered immediately to the fridge (Which I cleaned thoroughly before. ) It seemed strong. After numerous attempts to try to put a larger knife...on....the strip kept slipping down. I then tried to balance it out with another knife, kept slipping out. Did I do something wrong? I chatted with customer service but all they said was to return it so I am. Not sure if anyone else has had this problem with the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Janet H.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I live in an appartment and wanted something that would work on the side of my refrigerator without having to drill holes. This product works but for anyone else planning to do this just beware that you can not use very heavy knifes unless the surface is very smooth. The side of my refrigerator has a slight texture to it and if I put a heavy cleaver on it the whole thing slides down the side. I'm sure that it is the size stated on the product page but I wish it was longer. Once you start putting knifes on it you run out of room fast.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I got one for myself, loved it, then got one for my mom. I just have mine stuck to my fridge. There's a back portion that you take off to install the bar. You can either screw this portion to a wall then stick the magnetic bit to it, or you can just leave it off and stick the magnetic bit to anything metal. Holds knives well and stays in place. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: solved many storage issues!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! it holds my Chinese cleaver, Cutco scissors, Hinckels chef knife, and a multitude of Victorinox paring knives, all while it is magnetically attached to the side of our refrigerator. The heavier knife handles and scissors need to be placed with the handles close to the top of the magnet so they don't lean, but it is very strong. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: thefan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Magnetic Knife Holder
customer_reviews.text: This works so well, and I love having my knives close to where I use them, plus I was able to give my knife block away and it frees up some much needed counterspace. The size is great, I am using it with 8-9 knives and a pair of kitchen shears. I would highly recommend this for your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Smith

customer_reviews.title: Liked product but decided it wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product but found it to be very difficult to hang. The product states to get a pro to hang it. I spoke with the seller who apologized for any inconvenience and told me to contact Amazon to return the product if I wasn't very happy with it. After much thought and looking into the application of this product, I decided to keep it. It is a great product with a very strong magnet. It is very professional looking when applied on the wall.. Enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer  Hazel A. Bimer

customer_reviews.title: Blade down works best, but still great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this magnet. Instructions were easy; took out of box, was careful not to pinch fingers, and then stuck onto fridge. HAVE found -- as others have -- that blade down works best for the magnet. Even with this, it's a strong set-up and I am very confident that it will hold my knives. VERY happy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Millenial Problems

customer_reviews.title: I love it.  Super strong magnet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife holder. The magnet is SUPER STRONG. I read reviews where people said it was not, you need to remove the wall mount plate. I just put it on the side of our fridge to get more counter space. It feels very well made, everything stuck to it like a charm. There is NO WAY this is falling off the fridge. I will probably buy another one at some point. Great knife holder.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Don't think about it, just order!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little embarrassed, but I need to admit I haven't put this up yet. Not because I don't like them but because my kitchen is weird and I need help which I don't have. HOWEVER, they are out of the box and are so strong I can't believe it. I can't wait to have them up! Of course that requires a decision on where to put them and I have a problem making decisions. I think first I'll have someone come in and put up a real backsplash instead of floor vinyl. Are you checking these out? Don't hesitate, get them now. I don't think I've ever been so impressed with a product.
customer_reviews.author: farm girl

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen organizer with strong magnetic hold
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic bar was exactly what I was looking for. Matched my back splash perfectly! So excited to have my knives of lf my counter and out of the way. Holds my entire knife set. Installed it with the double sided tape that was included, no additional hardware needed. Will update to see how long lasting adhesive is, but currently seems like a strong hold
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly7

customer_reviews.title: Practical and wonderful
customer_reviews.text: We purchased, this, the husband and I, to resolve a knife storage debate of sorts, and we are both thrilled with the results. This adds a practical bit of style to the kitchen wall while saving space and making knives easily accessible. The mount was easy to install and seems easy enough to remove at whatever later date while no risk of falling until then. Our only regret is not buying another one as we apparently have more stuff we'd like to stick up there than we have room.
customer_reviews.author: Emily J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Save your money...The harbor Freight $4 magnet is 10x stronger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love This...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and looked at the pictures. Have a lot of high end knives, and have outgrown my block. Bought 2 of these and stuck them on the side of my fridge. How awesome... just as handy as ever, but I've got a place to keep my knives & I've freed up counter space. The magnets are pretty strong, so watch your fingers...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recieved damaged/defective set. Requested a replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I have requested a new replacement because 2 out of the 5 knives were defected and damaged. Other than that, a new replacement will be just fine. I have been in search for a new black set of knives for the modern look and they fit the picture. The quality and the accessories were a great touch for the price. Let's see how the new set arrives. I will update soon.
customer_reviews.author: NavyVet

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet, easy installation, still shiny and silver after almost two years!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best magnetic knife holder I have ever used. I purchased two for my home almost two years ago, and they still look and work like the day I installed them. Installation was incredibly simple and they haven't budged. One of my concerns was potential rust on the nice stainless metal surface (assuming cheaper materials) but its still shiny silver, even with roommates putting cleaned, wet knives back up to air dry. It's saved so much space to be able to throw out the knife block, and its so easy to pick out the right knife every time. It even holds our kitchen scissors!
customer_reviews.author: Zack M

customer_reviews.title: looks good. fits my entire knife set
customer_reviews.text: looks good. fits my entire knife set. biggest issue is the magnet strength. in my set i have a 7" butcher knife, a 7" chefs knife and a 6" cleaver among some other standard knives. i have to place the knives upside down (handles up - eg. reveres of how you see it in the product photo) otherwise they slide down - the magnet is not strong enough to hold them. also, not sure how they got that honing steel to stay like it is in the photo, without putting it upside down and resting the handle on the top of the magnet bar it would not hold it at all.
customer_reviews.author: I bought one

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - keeps knives off of counter
customer_reviews.text: I tried several knife blocks that didn't quite fit my set so this is the perfect solution. It keeps my knives within reach but off of the counter, freeing up space. It was super easy to install with a level and drill/screwdriver. I used drywall anchors before screwing in the screws and it's holding nicely. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon SuperReviewr

customer_reviews.title: efficient use of space
customer_reviews.text: I used gorilla glue double sided tape to put it up. it fell down once and I took off some of the knives and so far it is working. it is lovely, I hope it stays up. sure cleans off the county from those awful knife blocks that never has the one size slot I need. and this is so attractive
customer_reviews.author: Madame readsalot

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, for sure
customer_reviews.text: Very strong magnet. I installed this on tile, no screws, with double sided gorilla tape. No slipping. I wish I had discovered this item years ago. It’s now easy to safely retrieve a knife without fear of cutting myself. The stainless steel finish adds class to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Frugalman

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed from a knife holder, and a lot stronger of a magnet than expected. I’d never had a magnetic knife holder before and didn’t really know what to expect. I almost bought a tool holder from home depot or harbor freight because they’re cheaper and am definitely glad I didn’t. Worth the extra couple bucks. I live in a dorm so instead of screwing it into the wall I used two command strips to stick it on. Held fine for months.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Fine

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. I stuck mine to the side of the refrigerator, which allowed me to clear up some drawer and counter space in a very small kitchen. The strength of the magnet is sufficient for me to hang my 8" chefs knives without worrying about them accidentally falling off.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Space saving convenience.
customer_reviews.text: I have an older knife set I use regularly. This strip is actually magnetically mounted to the side of my fridge. It does not move or come off easily. It holds my knives very well. Makes my knife access very convenient while saving counter space from not using a knife block.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Really strong magnet, really easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Super pleased with this! It holds quite a bit (chef's, slicing, utility, santoku, paring, and 4 steak knives) easily and was super easy to install on my wall. It also was crazy strong against my fridge with the back plate removed. Everything hangs straight and it just makes me super happy to look at all my pretty knives stored so nicely :) They stick really well, yet it's also easy to slide them off when you need them! I'd been wanting one of these for literally years; wish I'd gotten it way sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Ella Apodaca

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to try to mount this on a wall, so I just put it on my fridge. I have several knives on it and it has stayed on my fridge with no problems. It hasn't moved an inch unless I move it. The knives stay on and haven't fallen off once. I have actually been thinking of purchasing a second one and getting help putting it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Super knife holder
customer_reviews.text: This looks beautiful and is just what I wanted. The only problem is it doesn't come in more sizes. Had to return the second one I purchased and couldn't buy another that would fit elsewhere in my kitchen, that would be adhered to the substrate without sticky tape or glue. I wish they had more of a size selection...
customer_reviews.author: Happy Chef

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: When I moved into an apartment with a very small kitchen with limited drawer space, I ordered two of these magnetic knife holders. I stuck them to the side of the refrigerator and put knives, scissors, etc. on them. I LOVE these things. The magnet is very strong and holds everything with no slippage and, although they can be mounted to the wall, for me, the refrigerator is the perfect place for them. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kizer

customer_reviews.title: It works...
customer_reviews.text: This is a typical knife block with very easy installation. I've given it three stars because what came out of the box was obviously a previously-used and repackaged item. The metal sheath on the outside of the magnet is scratched in a way that would only be scratched if people had hung it and put knives on it previously. Kind of crap that I paid for a new item and receive something so obviously used.
customer_reviews.author: E. J. W.

customer_reviews.title: Attaches directly to refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a knife holder that would attach safely to my refrigerator as I am renting an apartment with a small kitchen with tile backsplash. This Ouddy fit my needs perfectly. It has a bracket to attach to a wall that I have saved for future use should the need arise. I attached it directly to my refrigerator side and put several knives on it as well as a pair of heavy-duty scissors. Magnet hasn’t slipped down one bit. Great product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mamalyn1

customer_reviews.title: Tight on counter space? Ditch the block and put the fridge to work.. its just standing there..
customer_reviews.text: Great counter space saver that doubles as a decent subliminal intimidation for your home guests. Nothing suggests “dont f%#$ with me” like a kitchen display fit for any decent serial killer out of a Silence of the Lambs movie.. I got lots of knives =:-)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Burns

customer_reviews.title: Working so far.
customer_reviews.text: I got this b/c I didn't think my landlord would want me to drill holes in my wall to mount this, and I heard I could just use the magnet to stick it to something magnetic - in my case the overhead vent. It's working so far, but I took a star off b/c it slips sometimes if I put too many knives on it. But it mostly stays in place and is working for me. Overall, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: kooyawn

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This is a power magnet for sure! I have 6 knives, scissors and large pizza cutter attached to mine. Tip...I kept the plastic strip in place after attaching the screws. I trimmed the ends, but kept long enough to grab onto if I wanted to ever take it down. Can't really see it unless you look closely. The magnet is so powerful it was hard to pull pieces apart without using the plastic strip.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: best choice possible for storing my knives
customer_reviews.text: so glad we purchased this for our newly remodeled kitchen..... I like for my knives to always be sharp and this is the best possible storage for me..... super easy to install and holds even some of my heavier knives well; and out of my grandson's reach!
customer_reviews.author: LGC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome magnet for epoxy work.
customer_reviews.text: I used this magnet for my first knife holder epoxy project. It worked great, adhered to my walnut planks well. I put about 1/8 of epoxy over it and it still holds well. I have some of my processes to fix but the magnet did great. I will use this again.
customer_reviews.author: CDaniels

customer_reviews.title: No more need for clunky knifeblock
customer_reviews.text: I was going to attach this inside a cabinet door, but I decided to try it the easy way first. I put the knife holder on the side of the refrigerator. This actually turned out to be the most perfect and convenient placement for the knives and scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Alynny

customer_reviews.title: Works great ahold knives and spatulas very well
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this item (I bought 2) one for the kitchen, one for the BBQ outside. Just what I expected, seems to be good quality and looks great. Already some good comments from friends at the house. Maybe I will order another
customer_reviews.author: Danson G. Tolman

customer_reviews.title: High useful, space saving addition to any kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Really great little addition to my kitchen. I am able to store three knives, a micro plane, scissors, a whisk, and a cake tester easily in it. Saves space in my drawers and allows quick access to these essential tools. Also looks great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MikePrimeD

customer_reviews.title: Easy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The install of these took my husbands makita,a drill bit and a driver bit, level, rubber mallet, and a pencil. 5 minute install even for me! Two quick screws with provided molly bolts and they were up! Magnetic attackement hides the screws so it it a beautiful piece. Super strong magnets held an entire set! Exactly what I needed and goes great with my farmhouse decor!
customer_reviews.author: Brea Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Great for knives
customer_reviews.text: We had a problem of storage for our knives. Putting them in the drawer was dangerous, not good for the knives, and we did not have room. I've seen these in the past and always wanted one. It is really easy to install, all you need to do is drill two small holes. The instructions are clear and it is very strong. We keep about 5 knives and a pair of scissors on it and it holds all of them with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron N.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one - LOVED IT - bought another... We have one attached to the side of our fridge with our "good" knives and another mounted inside our pantry door with our "crappy" knives... Great product that I cannot recommend enough....
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: Attractive useful knife and tool holder
customer_reviews.text: I liked my first two so much that I ordered a third Ouddy holder. There was a small issue with it and I contacted Ouddy who promptly resolved the matter. So kudos to Ouddy for their service as well as their product! This particular 16" magnetic holder is very attractive, and you can attach it directly to a metal surface without drilling holes. So now I have two knife holders in the kitchen mounted to wood cabinets and a third in the workshop magnetically clamped to a metal cabinet and holding assorted tools.
customer_reviews.author: Rodavan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy needs anchors and 2 drywall screws to support for RV
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and heavy we had to anchor it in to wall of our RV but the final look is great!! held all my knives very strong magnetic! The only thing is no screws came with it so mabey it should have the anchors and screws with it otherwise your taking a trip to the store to get what you need!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: I love my magnetic knife holder!
customer_reviews.text: I love my magnetic knife holder! It attaches to the wall easily and doesn’t budge when removing a knife. We attached our first to our RV kitchen wall while living in it and loved it so much we now have two in our house kitchen. The holder and magnet is good quality; the knives stay firmly attached. The knives even stayed attached while pulling our RV. The finish has also stayed nice. What a great idea for getting rid of the pesky counter stealing knife block!
customer_reviews.author: Gods_Girl111

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and functional
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it. I installed this as soon as I received it. I waited to post the review to ensure it was sturdy and didn’t fall. I have tile backsplash and did not want to drill through the tile to mount, so I used 6 command strips as someone mentioned in a review - it worked flawlessly. No mess no drilling or screws. Very strong magnet..currently holding 8-10 knives and hasn’t budged since I hung it.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Magnet fairly weak.
customer_reviews.text: While I like mine, there is no way it could hold all that cutlery shown in the photo. We placed 6 similar items on ours and must place them handle up or they slide off quickly. Upside down the handle stops them.
customer_reviews.author: Jp Huller

customer_reviews.title: Not as functional as exepected
customer_reviews.text: Good - nice size, clean look. Bad - the surface is not flat, it is slightly rounded. So, rather than sticking to the bar over a flat line, the knives are held in place at a single point. The knives thereby rotate a bit and do not stay straight. We will be replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying the magnetic knife holder
customer_reviews.text: When ordering I was a little worried that magnet wasn't very strong , by some of the review/comments. I wanted it for the side of my fridge for my stove is next to it. I keep changing out & trying different knives just to see if I have a problem. So far so good they are all holding on tight enough to not fall off. I have a large butcher knife- fillet knife , 3 stake knifes ,2 paring knifes, plus 2 sets of scissors !! I don't have a cleaver, but if you do I see no problem .
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Magnet could be slightly stronger.
customer_reviews.text: The strip holds our Henckels knives adequately but we thought it was necessary to hang them with the hilts up so the ledge of the hilts help slightly support the weight of the larger knives. All else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: TX Floss

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with my purchase; I was looking for a magnetic knife holder that I didn't have to mount into the wall. With this one you have the option of mounting to the wall or placing it on a magnetic surface. I have 5 knifes hanging from it and it has not fallen or moved; it has saved so much space for me since I had the knives on a knife block on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, space saving and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this! I didn't want to drill into my tile backsplash and this is a solid weighty magnetic piece. I used 8 3M Command strips and not only is attached to the tile, I have 8 knives on this magnetic strip and it looks beautiful! I took that ugly wood knife block and put it in the recycle bin! I am going to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGurl

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! I used command bathroom strips (water resistant) to stick them to the tile backsplash by my stove. Just be sure to clean the area with rubbing alcohol. I used one pack (4 large and 2 small) and it is not budging, even though the backsplash wasn’t flush so it doesn’t have 100% adherence. I was sure it would fall but it appears to be holding up. Very strong magnet! Be careful of your fingers when attaching the backing plate and magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Grey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this. It helped remove some clutter from my counters, looks very sleek, and is fully functional. The magnetism very strong and holds my knives well. I can fit 6 with room for one or two more. I have a cleaver that takes up a bit of room.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Just what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is very strong and holds most of my knives. As others recommended, I put the handles up to prevent sliding. It has the perfect amount of hold. The magnet on the back allows for you to put it on the side of your fridge, and it also comes with screws. I did not use the screws, but I mounted it to my kitchen tile using scotch double sided extreme mounting tape (30 lb) and it seems very sturdy. I do wish that it came with mounting tape to hold it up so that I didn't have to buy any, but I still love it. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! (Side of Refrigerator install)
customer_reviews.text: I have very little counter space in my kitchen. So a magnet knife holder was a great idea and this unit is fantastic. I did not screw in the back piece like the company strong suggests. I have (7) knives hanging from the magnet that is attached to the side of my Frigidaire Refrigerator. Solid & strong; I may not risk it and buy some of the 3M adhesive backing. But for right now, it works and looks awesome! And for the price of $17... this is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie C.

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Kitchen Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation for someone familiar with getting things done. Straight forward simple and good quality magnetic bar. And it looks great too. Holds all my fave kitchen tools safely out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Chas

customer_reviews.title: Holds our knives great!
customer_reviews.text: This knife holder is substantial! It is pretty heavy, but I think it’s because of the strength of the magnet(s). We have it in our RV, and none of the knives have moved at all. We have 6 knives on the holder, but it would definitely hold several more. Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Tatergirl

customer_reviews.title: Good magnet but photo misleading it's a bit small
customer_reviews.text: If you only have a handful of knives this magnet wall holder is great, but don't let the photo deceive you it's fairly small and you can get about 4-5 good size chef knives on here but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Super Strong Magnet
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted to get rid of my knife block and free up counter space for a long time but didn't know how I would install a magnetic knife strip on a tile backsplash. I searched YouTube and found several recommendations to use the 3m velcro strips. This magnetic strip is perfect! It's flat with a very strong magnet. I have 6 knives and 2 kitchen sheers.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Freed Up My Counter Space
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, mounted side-by-side on the wall and gave away the knife block. Not only do they free up space on the counter, but items that I was constantly opening up drawers to access -- such as the bottle/can opener -- are now up there with them, so much more accessible.
customer_reviews.author: The Nibble

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet! Sticks great to side of fridge
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I have a small kitchen and it saves a ton of space. I didn't realize how many knives I had until I put up this thing. It fits all the knives my roommates left. Great buy! Get this thing and show it off at your next party.. I promise, it'll be a hit!* *results may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Sal

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: No directions, so like an idiot I took out the back plastic piece because I thought it was just to keep it from being scratched. Magnet is so-so, you have to put knives on it handle up
customer_reviews.author: Nlakat13

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Just got my knife holder. It's heavy with a strong magnet. I took the back mounting plate off and held it up to the side of my stainless refrigerator just to look at it and "Bam" , it locked on with the magnet. At 16" long, it holds all my knifes securely.
customer_reviews.author: jonmon1

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet holds extremely well, definite kitchen space saver
customer_reviews.text: We bought two strips to put in our camper to save very limited drawer space. We are absolutely thrilled by the purchase. The magnets are strong and have proven to be huge space savers. We were worried that utensils on the magnetic strip might fall off during travel, but so far none have. We use the strips for steak knives, cutting knives, scissors, and silverware.
customer_reviews.author: E. Paynter

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price! We mounted ours behind our stove on the backsplash with double-sided foam tape and it holds extremely well. Other reviewers said there knives slid right off but, as you can see, they stick fine. The mounting plate is one serious piece of steel, not plastic. The magnets hold the blades securely with no wiggling or sliding. Would definitely buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. O. Sandness

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!! Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite purchases ever! Instantly frees up drawer or counter space and it looks contemporary and cool. Easy to grab and put away knives! We store our kitchen scissors on it too. This size holds about 5-7 depending on sizes.
customer_reviews.author: alli-cat

customer_reviews.title: Measure first!
customer_reviews.text: I had an idea of where I wanted to put this, however I didn't measure first. It turned out to be a better idea to place it on the side of the refrigerator. Didn't have to use the mounting kit and it just snapped in place and holds even our large 'heavy' cleaver. Wonderfully powerful magnets and very elegant stainless steel look matches the fridge perfectly. The wife loves the placement. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ron in Rinconada. NM

customer_reviews.title: Nice and strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife strip. Strong enough to hold knives secured. I used three extra duty 3m Velcro strips. I think four may have been better. Pluse it leaves more counter space and looks sharp😁
customer_reviews.author: txcogirl

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to my fridge
customer_reviews.text: I decided to order this ASAP one afternoon after I heard my 2 year old drop something behind the couch and then exclaim, I need a better knife! It keeps knives, shears, and scissors out of her reach. We just slapped it on the side of the fridge, convenient and safe. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE STRENGTH OF THE MAGNET!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and hung mine one the side of the refrigerator. It holds so well! I was surprised at how well it not only adheres to the fridge, but also to the knives and scissors. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Coach YH

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have mine packed with heavy knives and none of them have ever fallen. It also doesn't harm the blades at all. The one issue is that due to it being stainless steel, it gets water marks.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this years ago
customer_reviews.text: We have one in the office kitchen, keeps the knives out of the way and within reach. Looks really nice too, like we are ready for Top Chef. The magnet is very strong, we have everything from a serrated bread knife to kitchen sheers up on ours.
customer_reviews.author: Slanted

customer_reviews.title: Great on my fridge, powerful magnet
customer_reviews.text: Like others, we removed the backplate from the magnet and stuck it to the side of our fridge. It works awesome and the magnet is powerful. We have a small wine opener, scissors, and three 6" blade knives. Technically it'll fit more like the demo picture shows, but since the grabbing angle is weird on the side of the fridge we think that 5 items is good to prevent your hand from bumping into another knife by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is obviously cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I put holes in my walls and mounted the bar, but when I tried to put one of my knives on it, it started swinging and moving. It was one of my smaller knives and it couldn’t hold it in place! Weak magnet=Unsafe. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Not very strong
customer_reviews.text: I'm super sad about this knife holder. I bought it after reading the great reviews specifically about how you can use it on the fridge, but it wasn't strong enough to stay up on my fridge. I tried reversing it, but then while it stuck to the fridge, it wouldn't hold any knives. So I tried to install it on my wall and it wouldn't stay where I needed it to. And after all that, it's too scratched to return. I'd recommend trying a different product.
customer_reviews.author: LittleBread

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Really easy to install! Super strong magnet! I use it for knife storage. Clears up some clutter by not taking up counter space (block) or worrying about cutting myself blindly reaching for something in a cabinet. Also really appreciate the ease of access as I love cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Lewis

product_meta.title: Magnetic Knife Holder, Ouddy 16 Inch Stainless Steel Magnetic Knife Strip, Magnetic Knife Bar Rack Block for Kitchen Utensil Holder, Art Supply Organizer & Tool Holder
feature_bullets: Premium Quality Magnetic Knife Strip - Our magnetic knife holder is made from top quality stainless steel and featuring a powerful magnet. Sleek, modern, space-saving design saves valuable countertop and workbench space, accenting any kitchen decor.

Durable Magnetic Knife Holder with Strong Magnetism - Ouddy Magnetic knife block is used to hold securely your knifes. And the powerful magnets will help keep children out of reach of sharp knives. Your knives will stay in place and not slide off this magnetic knife. It will never rust and never lose its powerful magnetic charge and easy to clean up.

Easy to Install Knife Magnet- This magnetic knife bar comes with mounting hardware and easy to follow illustrated instructions on the webpage so you can mount the magnetic knife strip and organize your kitchen right away!

Multipurpose Magnetic Knife Rack - This magnetic knife has an extended length that allows you to hold more knives than most knife blocks on the market while still being small enough to fit in well into many nooks and crannies in yourmount onto kitchen walls with ease; all hardware included for easy installation. Ouddy magnetic knife holder can be used as knife holder, knife strip, knife rack, kitchen utensil holder, home organizer, art supply organizer & tool holder.

Absolutely RISK FREE Purchase - We are so confident in the quality of our product that you'll love it. If for any reason you are unsatisfied with magnetic knife holder, simply contact us to return the product for a FULL Refund or Replacement. Just click add to cart on this page to get yours NOW!
